data:
220---------- Welcome to Pure-FTPd [privsep] [TLS] ----------
220-You are user number 1 of 50 allowed.
220-Local time is now 03:03. Server port: 21.
220-This is a private system - No anonymous login
220-IPv6 connections are also welcome on this server.
220 You will be disconnected after 15 minutes of inactivity.
530 Login authentication failed
214-The following SITE commands are recognized
 ALIAS
 CHMOD
 IDLE
 UTIME
214 Pure-FTPd - http://pureftpd.org/
211-Extensions supported:
 EPRT
 IDLE
 MDTM
 SIZE
 MFMT
 REST STREAM
 MLST type*;size*;sizd*;modify*;UNIX.mode*;UNIX.uid*;UNIX.gid*;unique*;
 MLSD
 AUTH TLS
 PBSZ
 PROT
 UTF8
 TVFS
 ESTA
 PASV
 EPSV
 SPSV
211 End.

CVE-2018-15919.summary: Remotely observable behaviour in auth-gss2.c in OpenSSH through 7.8 could be used by remote attackers to detect existence of users on a target system when GSS2 is in use. NOTE: the discoverer states 'We understand that the OpenSSH developers do not want to treat such a username enumeration (or "oracle") as a vulnerability.'

CVE-2018-15473.summary: OpenSSH through 7.7 is prone to a user enumeration vulnerability due to not delaying bailout for an invalid authenticating user until after the packet containing the request has been fully parsed, related to auth2-gss.c, auth2-hostbased.c, and auth2-pubkey.c.

CVE-2017-15906.summary: The process_open function in sftp-server.c in OpenSSH before 7.6 does not properly prevent write operations in readonly mode, which allows attackers to create zero-length files.

Due to maintenance, our IPTV customers will experience an outage on LOCAL CHANNE

Due to maintenance, our IPTV customers will experience an outage on LOCAL CHANNELS only between the hours of midnight and 2 a.m. We are sorry for any inconvenience this may cause. Source

Tonight Bledsoe Telephone experienced a wide spread internet outage due to a cut

Tonight Bledsoe Telephone experienced a widespread internet outage due to a cut fiber outside of our area. This affected all 3 of our routes for incoming and outgoing traffic. We have been notified that the fiber has been repaired. If you are still having trouble with...

Change in my Pocket

Ethan and General Manager Charlie Boring set down with Cody McCarver to talk about Valley Fest 2019. Source

read more
12345Next »

Bledsoe Telephone Cooperative is awarding two $1000 scholarships…

…to high school seniors enrolled in a college, university, or technical school in the Fall of this year, whose parent(s) or guardian(s) is an active member of Bledsoe Telephone Cooperative in good standing.

Throughout its history, the United States has adopted policies which took advantage of major technological advances that led to prosperity as a nation. In the 19th century, it was the development of canals and a national railroad system. In the 20th century, it was rural electrification (which allowed rural citizens to come together to form Bledsoe Telephone Cooperative) and the national highway system. Today, high-speed broadband Internet access is as vital as phones, electricity, and roads. Those without this access, particularly people in rural areas, are left stranded on the wrong side of the digital divide.
